## IRoomBase interface

A base data contract for room entities.

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface IRoomBase<TType extends RoomType = RoomType> extends IEntityBase 
```
**Extends:** [IEntityBase](./zrocket-contracts.ientitybase.md)
